verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: When] [ARG0: we] [V: quote] [ARG1: the Word] , well be compared to people who want to separate children from their parents ( as is happening with the immigration crisis ) . Well be likened to brainless Trump supporters ( regardless of the topic under discussion ) . And well be reminded that the Bible really has no intentional message . It means whatever you want it to mean .
